text: Apion pisi is a species of seed weevils native to Europe.Fauna EuropaeaMorris, M.G., 1990 Orthocerous Weevils: Coleoptera Curculionoidea (Nemonychidae, Anthribidae, Urodontidae, Attelabidae and Apionidae) Handbooks for Identification of British Insects Volume: 5.16 Royal Entomological Society, London Illustrations : 321 text figs It is phytophagous and a pest of lucerne ==References== ==External links== *Images representing Apion at BOLD Category:Brentidae Category:Beetles described in 1801 Category:Beetles of Europe
title: Apion pisi
